name: 3 Club Golf
description:
Change the way you play VR Golf. Get Ready for the perfect blend of golf physics, skill, and arcade fun. Play alone or online - at any of 12+ stylized golf courses. Control your shots accurately and easily with 3 Club's innovative VR control panel. Take the perfect swing, unlock new challenges, collect great rewards, and have an amazing virtual golf experience.

Earn in-game currency by completing courses, competing online, and accomplishing golf challenges. Create and customize your own multiplayer golfer. Stop by the clubhouse store to spend your game money on new balls, clubs, grips, club covers, hats, outfits for your robot... and much more.


Did we say Robot? Yeah. Of course, a state-of-the-art, customizable robot caddie to help you along your way.

GOLF IN VR... WITH A TWIST

You only have 3 clubs, but that's all you need. A wedge (short distance), an iron (longer), and a putter to help the ball into its hole. Visit one of 12+ hand-crafted original golf courses like a swamp, a horse farm, a desert mine, or even a dome-covered space station. Can you make it across that deep lake? Take a chance and make the perfect shot.


It's always a different day at 3 Club! Never get bored of the same old golf course. Random pin positions give each green an unmatched level of variety. Use your strategy and witts to keep your score low.



3 Club Golf is a part real and part arcade. Your actual swing speed determines the shot. Using a fully interactive, yet simple, VR menu, you can control your ball's movement with actions like slice, hook, backspin, knock-down, flop, and more to get the perfect approach. Use your 3-D mini-map and personal shot camera to track and aim your hits. The wind, weather, wildlife, and other course hazards will challenge even the most skilled golfer. It's like real golf, only more fun! Give it a try.

BASIC SYNOPSIS:

VR Golf... with a robot, where the player can only choose between 3 clubs; a putter, a short wedge, and a long iron. There are 9 holes per course and all holes are par 3 or 4. The player is guided by a robot caddie as they attempt to open up new courses and challenges.

KEY FEATURES

  • 12 unique 9-hole courses to master. (plus additional bonus courses)
  • Customizable clubs, putters, balls, grips, shafts, and more.
  • Play solo, 1v1 online matches, or create a private room to play with a friend.
  • Adjustable swing sensitivity to make it feel just like the real thing.
  • Collect secrets and earn in-game money to spend at the store.
  • Complete challenges to unlock special clubs and items.
  • Random hole placements for maximum replayability.
  • Realistic wind and weather affect ball physics.
  • Driving range, practice green, and mini-games of skill coming soon!
  • Skins game mode coming soon.
